channel.title: UberScape 1.0
channel.description:
[center][font=impact][size=36pt]UberScape 1.0[/size][/font][/center]
Hello moparscape, Welcome to my project I have been working on this for about 4 months the project is coming along great. I am trying to get more supporters. The server is based at a home area posted below, the server will be slow train and hard obtained items. the server will be hosted on a dedicated server and hosted 24/7. The server is suppose to bring back the Dodian feeling, the server is hyperion/runesource based but is written from scratch and the framework is called summersEnd. I want to make sure that the players are always content with the updates or the current features of the server.
Home [url=http://i48.tinypic.com/33tr0hy.png]http://i48.tinypic.com/33tr0hy.png[/url]
[size=14pt][u][b]Update blog[/b][/u][/size] 9/1/12 - Project Started 9/1/12 - Login 9/2/12 - Multiplayer 9/2/12 - Player chat 9/2/12 - food added 9/2/12 - Potions added 9/3/12 - levelup messages 9/3/12 - sendmesssage/sendlevels 9/4/12 - item support 9/4/12 - npc support added 9/5/12 - 12 packets added 9/5/12 - dialouge system 9/6/12 - Beta Test(12 Bugs Found) 9/7/12 - Fixed Login Bug 9/7/12 - 100% item support 9/7/12 - NPC combat starter 9/7/12 - perfect bonuses 9/7/12 - perfect weapon timers 9/15/12 - Combat tweeked 9/15/12 - Range support 9/15/12 - projectiles 9/15/12 - Distant checks 9/15/12 - High/Low alch added 9/17/12 - fishing started 9/17/12 - tons of fishing sports added 9/17/12 - NPC death added w/ transformation if needed 9/18/12 - NPC Special attacks on player 9/22/12 - Player Vs NPC - NPC Vs Player completed 9/22/12 - banking fixed 9/23/12 - server cleaned 9/24/12 - running supported w/ agility effects 10/2/12 - Player Vs Player combat added 10/2/12 - Magic on NPC added 10/2/12 - Player death w/ protect item 10/4/12 - Prayer added 10/6/12 - Fletching completed 10/6/12 - 12 special attacks added 10/6/12 - GFX supported now 10/6/12 - NPCdrops 10/12/12 - Skull system added 10/12/12 - Barrows started 10/12/12 - Black out Barrows Mini Map 10/12/12 - Arhims using Mage 10/12/12 - Can only spawn 1 on each monster(barrows) 10/15/12 - Cooking started 10/15/12 - ServerConfig Added 10/15/12 - 100+ Doors added 10/21/12 - All Potions perfected 10/21/12 - Player Frozen Added 10/21/12 - teleblock added 10/26/12 - bug with walking fixed 10/26/12 - bug w/ teleporting fixed 10/30/12 - Player combat completed 11/2/12 - perfect item requirements 11/2/12 - Lost city addded 11/3/12 - Lots of web development completed
for more info please refer to http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/451769-uberscape-1-0-a.html
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/169j8xy.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/xsx3k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34j88jp.jpg[/img]

item.title: UberScape 1.0
item.dc:creator: @Dalton2 Dalton_
item.description:
@Dalton2 wrote:

[center][font=impact][size=36pt]UberScape 1.0[/size][/font][/center]

Hello moparscape, Welcome to my project I have been working on this for about 4 months the project is coming along great. I am trying to get more supporters. The server is based at a home area posted below, the server will be slow train and hard obtained items. the server will be hosted on a dedicated server and hosted 24/7. The server is suppose to bring back the Dodian feeling, the server is hyperion/runesource based but is written from scratch and the framework is called summersEnd. I want to make sure that the players are always content with the updates or the current features of the server.

Home http://i48.tinypic.com/33tr0hy.png

[size=14pt]Update blog[/size]

10/6/12 - Fletching completed

10/12/12 - Arhims using Mage
